amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds with respect to the Fifth Circuit Court case of Texas v. U.S., regarding executive amnesty.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds in the Fifth Circuit Court case of Texas v. U.S.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A082) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 204 (Roll no. 293).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
